frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-server
frozen.shortDescription: A simple Indicator that shows my home-server status (online / offline) on the main panel. Furthermore a wake on lan can be triggered. For WOL functionality, its necessary that you have 'wakeonlan' installed. This extension is only tested with Gnome 40+. Didnt test it yet with older versions.
frozen.longDescription: A simple Indicator that shows my home-server status (online / offline) on the main panel. Furthermore a wake on lan can be triggered. For WOL functionality, its necessary that you have 'wakeonlan' installed. This extension is only tested with Gnome 40+. Didnt test it yet with older versions.
